title: Sex-mad female prison guard BUSTED in raunchy romps with killer inmate
itunes:title: Sex-mad female prison guard BUSTED in raunchy romps with killer inmate
description:
A female prison guard is sentenced to jail after a sex romp with a double murderer. Lauren McIntyre, 32, the mother of two, is accused of having a four-month fling with a man who strangled his girlfriend and baby daughter to death.

Joining Nancy Grace Today

  • Ashley Wilcott - Judge and trial attorney, anchor at Court TV  www.ashleywillcott.com
  • Dr. Angela Arnold - Psychiatrist, Atlanta Ga www.angelaarnoldmd.com
  • Robert Crispin - Private Investigator “Crispin Special Investigations” www.crispinsinvestigations.com
  • Percy Pitzer - Retired Federal Warden 30-year career in Corrections, Founder 'Creative Corrections Education Foundation', www.ccefscholarships.org
  • Ray Caputo - Lead News Anchor for Orlando's Morning News, 96.5 WDBO



Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
